page.title: 04Games children play.
page.content: Many children play different games at parties such as pass the parcel, musical chairs , hide the sweet and apple bobbing. These are good fun to play.Many children play outdoor games. Some of the games they play are hide and seek ,tiggy off ground, cricket, rounders, block, two bally. Indoor games are very good for rainy days. They play many different games such as Monopoly, O's and X's,Scrabble, Guess Who,draughts, snakes and ladders , hangman,ludo, Cluedo,Connect 4,Game of Life,Yahtzee, chess,Mouse Trap and Stay Alive.These are all board games. There are many card games such as snap,fish and pontoon.There are also seaonal games, in autumn and winter there are conkers and snowballing,when its warmer skipping and marbles.
